entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 11:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: N 19 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero except minus 4 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low zero except minus 4 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 over the Highlands. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
